reviews.review_msg: This Prof assumed a level of understanding prior to entry of this class which most students did not have.  His teaching style leaves much to be desired.  Payman did not instill confidence in his students.

Good Prof. but some of his teaching was a little high level for some people in the class. He was available for extra help and questions and he even gave extra help sessions. But this class needs a tutorial.

Payman Jula made simple material very complicated and difficult to understand. He did not provide enough opportunities for students to practice the material. He was never willing to respond to student questions.
